info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 12 at 9:51AM CDT until June 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Texas, including the following counties, Bexar, Guadalupe and Wilson.
* WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. River and stream flows are elevated.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 951 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 3 and 7 inches of rain have fallen over the last several hours. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Antonio, Schertz, Cibolo, Converse, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Randolph AFB, San Antonio Int Airport, Stinson Municipal Airport, Kirby, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Hollywood Park, Olmos Park, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia and China Grove. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING

area.areaDesc: Bexar, TX; Guadalupe, TX; Wilson, TX
